overview: Part of the trilogy "A Contraluz", three short films by Eduardo Chapero-Jackson completed with "Lightborne" (2007) and "The End" (2008). Premiered in official selection at Venice and pre-selected for the Oscars, this film whose main character is  Macarena Gomez,  tells the story of a young woman, obsessed with her appearance, who tries to become a mannequin.
title: Contracuerpo
